inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 60-15 mls/min as per the modified diet in renal disease formula (Stage 3 and 4 Chronic Kidney Disease)

inclusion.criterion: Daytime systolic blood pressure on ambulatory monitor
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: >135 mm Hg while taking 3 or more anti-hypertensives including a diuretic on maximal dose OR <135 but taking 4 or more anti-hypertensives

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: not suitable for renal denervation based on the Indications for Use

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery, which may be a contraindication for renal denervation.
